Hello,
As I mentioned before http://www.ai-dax.com donated a new template 
=
for us...  you can take a look here http://www.shinsengumihq.com

however, =
my question to anyone out there is this:
-the SHQ server does have a databa=
se option
-SHQ has a shocking 79 pages (which over time may be reduced, 
st=
reamlined and consolidated whatever you call it)
-Does anyone know how to b=
uild a database driven website?
-if so can you just explain it to me?  beca=
use I read stuff online 
and it doesn't make sense (^_^) you can email me a=
t secretarytocapt3
(a)hotmail.com  we can set up a chat time 

we got the i=
nfo! (actually we are back logged 3 months, during this 
entire time of NO =
UPDATES on SHQ.com people like Hirotada Tokugawa 
and myself have amassed e=
ven more info...like alot really ^_^ as 
usual we await more contributions =
from anyone on this list or the 
general public, be it fan-work, fanfic fan=
art cosplay you name it, 
you can post here, email the site and so forth) 
=

we got the graphics!  (the spiffy art)

but we need to make our site more =
"sleek"

if we can really do a good job with SHQ, future fans which may 
ar=
rive in the future won't have to start with point "A" (as we've 
had to do)=
, they can just read some of our pages and then move on 
quickly to learn w=
hatever they are most interested in...so we need a 
strong layout to make t=
hat all happen

with a strong layout the webmaster can cut back time on the=
 manual 
work required in updating and instead use the time for research (I=
'm 
down to like 6 months where I have access to a research library, so 
fo=
r me personally I just want to get an understanding of the history-
--the m=
anga and stuff I can buy LATER when I have money).
  
So if you see alot of=
 "nerd" history stuff on SHQ, that is because I 
am using what I have at my=
 disposal. If you hear otherwise that SHQ 
is not "into" pop-culture then i=
t is a simple misunderstanding.

--------------------
General Announcement
=
--------------------
As you may know Youtube was purchased by Google, thus =
it discourages 
the posting of copyright material
for example, if you post =
a clip of anime being broadcasted in 
Japan---you will get in trouble etc e=
tc
we don't want anyone to have to deal with legal issues (^_^)

Even thoug=
h Youtube's upcoming policy and strict enforcement will 
really annoy many =
